name: stellar-media-organizer
description: Stellar Media Organizer - Organize movies, series & music for Plex/Jellyfin with IMDB/MusicBrainz integration and GPU conversion

scripts.dev: concurrently -n GPU,API,WEB -c blue,green,magenta "pnpm run gpu" "pnpm run api" "pnpm run web"
scripts.stop: pkill -f gpu_converter_service.py; pkill -f standalone_backend.py; pkill -f vite
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:python && pnpm run lint:js
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run lint:fix:python && pnpm run lint:fix:js
scripts.lint:fix:python: cd webapp/backend && ruff check . --fix && ruff format .
scripts.lint:fix:js: cd webapp/frontend && npx eslint . --fix && npx prettier --write 'src/**/*.{js,jsx}'
